cogimag.javafx

Class FxMessageBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • cogimag.javafx.FxMessageBox

  • public class FxMessageBox
extends java.lang.Object
    A modal dialog box that displays an informational message with an OK button.

    • Method Detail

      • show

        public static void show(java.lang.String title,
                        java.lang.String message)
        Displays a message box using FX tools. User clicks "OK" when done.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the window
        message - The body of the message
